channel.title: How to stop npc's walk trough walls?
channel.description: i use 562 pkzevolution, i can't walk trough walls, but if i attack a npc and run behind a tree or a wall,..., the npc just walks trough the wall! how do i fix this?! i can't make a good rsps without npc clipping!

item.title: How to stop npc's walk trough walls?
item.dc:creator: @ultraking_x2 ultraking x2
item.description:
@ultraking_x2 wrote:

i use 562 pkzevolution, i can’t walk trough walls, but if i attack a npc and run behind a tree or a wall,…, the npc just walks trough the wall! how do i fix this?!
i can’t make a good rsps without npc clipping!

Read full topic
item.source: How to stop npc's walk trough walls?
